snippet: Larry Wilmore, a seasoned television writer and producer and “Daily Show” regular, prepares to lead his own commentators on “The Minority Report With Larry Wilmore.”
abstract: Larry Wilmore, seasoned television writer and producer and Daily Show regular, is preparing to host his own late-night show on Comedy Central entitled The Minority Report with Larry Wilmore.
lead_paragraph: Larry Wilmore, a seasoned television writer and producer and “Daily Show” regular, prepares to lead his own commentators on “The Minority Report With Larry Wilmore.”
